mapper.insert: insert into report(reportContent, reportType, reportUserIdGet, reportPostId, reportDiscussId, reportTime, reportUserIdSet, reportLife) values (#{reportContent}, #{reportType}, #{reportUserIdGet}, #{reportPostId}, #{reportDiscussId}, #{reportTime}, #{reportUserIdSet}, #{reportLife})
mapper.select: select * from report where reportLife = 0 ORDER BY reportTime
select * from report where reportLife != 0 ORDER BY reportTime
